hero.title: About OwnersDirect
hero.subtitle: Connecting property owners directly with renters and buyers, eliminating middlemen and creating transparent real estate transactions.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: At OwnersDirect, we recognize the power of the internet in connecting people directly. Gone are the days when a middleperson was needed to link a supplier with a consumer, a farmer with a restaurant, or even a bride with a groom. So why should property agents still collect thousands — even millions — just for standing between two parties of a transaction?
story.paragraph2: OwnersDirect was created to challenge that status quo. We are the UAE's first direct owner-to-buyer property marketplace, built on trust, transparency, and simplicity. Our bilingual platform (English/Arabic) allows verified owners to list their properties confidently, while buyers and renters can connect directly with them — without agents, commissions, or hidden costs.
story.paragraph3: Every listing is backed by ID and proof of ownership, ensuring credibility and peace of mind for all users. We believe real estate should be straightforward: just owners and buyers, connected.

mission.title: What We Provide
mission.description: OwnersDirect.ae was created in the UAE to serve the UAE. Our bilingual platform (EN/AR) reflects the cultural and professional diversity of the region, ensuring trust and ease for both citizens and residents.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance
section1.content: By accessing OwnersDirect.ae, you agree to these Terms of Use.

section2.title: 2. Purpose
section2.content: OwnersDirect.ae is an early-access MVP marketplace connecting property owners directly with buyers and renters. We are not a broker or agent. All transactions occur directly between users.

section3.title: 3. Verification
section3.content: Owners must provide identification and property details. Buyers must verify identity and confirm they are not brokers. OwnersDirect.ae moderates listings but does not guarantee accuracy of information.

section4.title: 4. No Guarantees
section4.content: Information on this site is provided 'as is.' We make no warranties regarding accuracy, completeness, or availability.

section5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
section5.content: To the maximum extent permitted by UAE law, OwnersDirect.ae is not liable for losses, damages, or disputes arising from use of this platform.

section6.title: 6. User Conduct
section6.content: Users must not upload illegal, offensive, or misleading content. OwnersDirect.ae reserves the right to remove content or suspend users at its discretion.

section7.title: 7. Privacy
section7.content: We collect and store user data as described in our Privacy Policy.

section8.title: 8. Changes
section8.content: We may update these Terms at any time by posting a revised version. Continued use of the site indicates acceptance.

section9.title: 9. Governing Law
section9.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of the United Arab Emirates.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect only the information you provide through forms (name, email, phone, property details) and basic technical logs (IP address, browser type) for security.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Data
section2.content: Data is used to verify users, display listings, facilitate buyer-seller contact, and improve platform services.

section3.title: 3. Data Sharing
section3.content: We do not sell or trade your data. Data may be shared only with service providers (e.g., hosting, email) under strict confidentiality.

section4.title: 4. Retention
section4.content: We keep your data only as long as necessary to provide services or as required by UAE law.

section5.title: 5. Security
section5.content: We apply technical and administrative safeguards (encryption, access controls) to protect your data.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights
section6.content: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your data by contacting hello@ownersdirect.ae.

section7.title: 7. Changes
section7.content: We may revise this Privacy Policy. Updates will be posted on this page.

section8.title: 8. Contact
section8.content: For questions about privacy, contact hello@ownersdirect.ae.
